chain.description: The chain which the event belongs to (e.g. iotex, ethereum)

provider.description: The provider used to source the event (e.g. infura, consensus)

type.description: The type of event (e.g. block, transaction)

height.description: The height of the block the event belongs to

received_at.description: Timestamp of the event in unix format

sender_balance.description: The sender's balance at the time of the event

recipient_balance.description: The recipient's balance at the time of the event

amount.description: The amount transferred in the event

price.description: The exchange price of the coin at the time of the event

gas_fee.description: The gas fee paid for the transaction
